content: crochet cable gauntlets by christie pruitt materials 1 skein caron simply soft size h crochet hook yarn needle gauge 4 single_crochet = 1 5 row = 1 in single_crochet finished size length 9 ½ will fit woman s small/medium right glove chain 29 row 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook and in each chain across chain 1 turn 28 single_crochet row 2 single_crochet across chain 1 turn row 3 single_crochet in next 18 single_crochet skip next 2 single_crochet work a double_crochet in next 2 single_crochet by dropping down to row 1 inserting needle from front to back and around post of corresponding stitch then work a treble_crochet in the 1st then the 2nd skipped stitches by inserting needle from front to back and around post of corresponding stitch from row 1 cross-over made single_crochet in last 6 single_crochet chain 1 turn row 4 single_crochet across chain 1 turn row 5 single_crochet across next 18 single_crochet work a double_crochet around the post of the next 2 treble crochets and the next 2 double crochets from row below single_crochet in last 6 single_crochet chain 1 turn row 6 as row 4 continue in cable pattern working from row 3 through row 6 five more times thumb increases next row 2 single_crochet into first single_crochet work in pattern to last st 2 single_crochet in last stitch chain 1 turn repeat this row on both right side and wrong side row for a total of 8 times 44 stitches - 8 extra stitches on each end for thumb work even until glove measures 8 from beginning next row slip_stitch in next 8 thumb sts work in pattern across leaving last 8 sts unworked chain 1 turn you should have just completed row 3 of cable pattern work cable pattern row 4 - 6 then row 3 once more over remaining 28 stitches cut yarn left glove the left glove will be worked the same as the right glove - the only difference is that the location of the cable will change follow pattern for right glove until row 3 row 3 for left glove 1 single_crochet in next 6 single_crochet work cross-over as for right glove single_crochet in last 18 single_crochet chain 1 turn work row 4 row 5 for left glove 1 single_crochet in next 6 single_crochet work double crochets as for right glove single_crochet in last 18 single_crochet chain 1 turn work row 6 continue with left glove as per instructions from right glove remembering that the cable is now in a new location finishing i seamed these gloves on the right side of the glove instead of with wrong sides together - because i didn t like the thick seam it created along the thumb i used a running stitch not a whip stitch to do this the whip stitch will show seam side edges thumb and area on edge of hand above the thumb work a crab stitch reverse crochet around top of hand top edge of thumb and
